page.title: 02IMPRESSIONS OF HANLEY
page.content:
I (Lessa Adams)live in a semi-detached house in Hanley.My mum and dad have lived in number one for thirteen years and the street is called Mulberry Street.There are ten houses in our street with our house and they are all the same age.There are still a lot of terraced homes in Hanley though. I like Hanley and I think it is a very good place for shopping.I also like the discos and I go to one in Bryan Street with my friends.I think there should be more disco places for children and more parks and playgrounds for children in Hanley.
I(Stuart Summerhill)think Hanley is a very nice town with lots of children so I can make lots of friends.There is a paper mill and a factory which gives you golf balls and Hanley is a very busy town with lots of shops.
